data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/bMvuciIEQKzgz0Xt7cwm2oR3nVR.jpg","id":44967,"title":"Strike","original_title":"Стачка","overview":"Workers in a factory in pre-revolutionary Russia go on strike and are met by violent suppression.","poster_path":"/mrDTaMxQKxWZ3uEs2G58vJWJDDL.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ru","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":10.776,"release_date":"1925-04-28","video":false,"vote_average":7.29,"vote_count":205},{"backdrop_path":"/ohn9zA2dUbVuo4ajx32Em97qvMr.jpg","id":9797,"title":"Ivan the Terrible, Part I","original_title":"Иван Грозный","overview":"Set during the early part of his reign, Ivan faces betrayal from the aristocracy and even his closest friends as he seeks to unite the Russian people.  Sergei Eisenstein's final film, this is the first part of a three-part biopic of Tsar Ivan IV of  Russia, which was never completed due to the producer's dissatisfaction with Eisenstein's attempts to use forbidden experimental filming techniques and excessive cost overruns.  The second part was completed but not released for a decade after Eisenstein's death and a change of heart in the USSR government toward his work; the third part was only in its earliest stage of filming when shooting was stopped altogether.","poster_path":"/rzFWfdq6CXLCnlfXTTZs9W9dMR2.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ru","genre_ids":[18,36],"popularity":18.069,"release_date":"1944-11-11","video":false,"vote_average":7.301,"vote_count":193},{"backdrop_path":"/5CmuxqxyHMRjuHDyx76wSu26wjw.jpg","id":445,"title":"Caché","original_title":"Caché","overview":"George, host of a television show focusing on literature, receives videos shot on the sly that feature his family, along with disturbing drawings that are difficult to interpret. He has no idea who has made and sent him the videos. Progressively, the contents of the videos become more personal, indicating that the sender has known George for a long time.","poster_path":"/IC2BPYDSsNPP1Q1VuXUiKrRwbU.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[9648,18,53],"popularity":32.026,"release_date":"2005-10-05","video":false,"vote_average":7.1,"vote_count":1045},{"backdrop_path":"/A1mteOfKdvK5er2sD5i02Qw3CWz.jpg","id":780,"title":"The Passion of Joan of Arc","original_title":"La Passion de Jeanne d'Arc","overview":"A classic of the silent age, this film tells the story of the doomed but ultimately canonized 15th-century teenage warrior. On trial for claiming she'd spoken to God, Jeanne d'Arc is subjected to inhumane treatment and scare tactics at the hands of church court officials. Initially bullied into changing her story, Jeanne eventually opts for what she sees as the truth. Her punishment, a famously brutal execution, earns her perpetual martyrdom.","poster_path":"/8OYGtQlO8k9PcOm49apV62eVJQo.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[18,36],"popularity":23.049,"release_date":"1928-04-21","video":false,"vote_average":8.0,"vote_count":896},{"backdrop_path":"/zc5vjonSbXUUazuQSi0R2bUfWNP.jpg","id":1405,"title":"Greed","original_title":"Greed","overview":"A lottery win of $5,000 forever changes the lives of a miner turned dentist and his wife.","poster_path":"/zT8XclM0tX5nVsnU3Idsn2Nzdo5.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18,80],"popularity":10.855,"release_date":"1924-12-04","video":false,"vote_average":7.4,"vote_count":169},{"backdrop_path":"/h68ilwiTesb5wmDgy2mHYkVuOBP.jpg","id":961,"title":"The General","original_title":"The General","overview":"During America’s Civil War, Union spies steal engineer Johnny Gray's beloved locomotive, 'The General'—with Johnnie's lady love aboard an attached boxcar—and he single-handedly must do all in his power to both get The General back and to rescue Annabelle.","poster_path":"/nIp4gIXogCjfB1QABNsWwa9gSca.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,28,12,10752],"popularity":37.796,"release_date":"1926-12-25","video":false,"vote_average":7.966,"vote_count":1190},{"backdrop_path":"/inb0a3zdLW8GUDcfj7HNORTthrY.jpg","id":697,"title":"October (Ten Days that Shook the World)","original_title":"Октябрь","overview":"Sergei M. Eisenstein's docu-drama about the 1917 October Revolution in Russia. Made ten years after the events and edited in Eisenstein's 'Soviet Montage' style, it re-enacts in celebratory terms several key scenes from the revolution.","poster_path":"/tsfz9Ak1slSnxr6mSmRD3Wj7YZS.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ru","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":12.711,"release_date":"1928-01-20","video":false,"vote_average":6.872,"vote_count":192},{"backdrop_path":"/rnN9yJfwso6JA64wIPqK1m6K6e1.jpg","id":19,"title":"Metropolis","original_title":"Metropolis","overview":"In a futuristic city sharply divided between the rich and the poor, the son of the city's mastermind meets a prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.","poster_path":"/pxbGZewX327IbTvrCVRJgcLJTSQ.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"de","genre_ids":[18,878],"popularity":44.735,"release_date":"1927-02-06","video":false,"vote_average":8.141,"vote_count":2653},{"backdrop_path":"/byRNEm1QwfQC1Mn0K4gLM2fIfWO.jpg","id":26317,"title":"Man with a Movie Camera","original_title":"Человек с киноаппаратом","overview":"A cameraman wanders around with a camera slung over his shoulder, documenting urban life with dazzling inventiveness.","poster_path":"/vJgAdgJWX54v0oXfIvhwjlZnmgn.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ru","genre_ids":[99],"popularity":23.048,"release_date":"1929-05-12","video":false,"vote_average":7.854,"vote_count":699},{"backdrop_path":"/4Zc7ja5d4eGTT0rpx1pOCVLiRgW.jpg","id":649,"title":"Belle de Jour","original_title":"Belle de jour","overview":"Beautiful young housewife Séverine Serizy cannot reconcile her masochistic fantasies with her everyday life alongside dutiful husband Pierre. When her lovestruck friend Henri mentions a secretive high-class brothel run by Madame Anais, Séverine begins to work there during the day under the name Belle de Jour. But when one of her clients grows possessive, she must try to go back to her normal life.","poster_path":"/iUAFECovwPA0cVV9bo4uNGLJSGL.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[18,10749],"popularity":23.227,"release_date":"1967-05-24","video":false,"vote_average":7.381,"vote_count":850},{"backdrop_path":"/4H4RAeeykpi0ijvu3wYgV346y06.jpg","id":618,"title":"The Birth of a Nation","original_title":"The Birth of a Nation","overview":"Two families, abolitionist Northerners the Stonemans and Southern landowners the Camerons, intertwine. When Confederate colonel Ben Cameron is captured in battle, nurse Elsie Stoneman petitions for his pardon. In Reconstruction-era South Carolina, Cameron founds the Ku Klux Klan, battling Elsie's congressman father and his African-American protégé, Silas Lynch.","poster_path":"/pNpOXpQI5GSUfiWypubYtMh9928.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18,36,10752],"popularity":21.464,"release_date":"1915-02-08","video":false,"vote_average":6.034,"vote_count":508},{"backdrop_path":"/oaST3eeNwUh7xWx2xnrp4IQejHb.jpg","id":33015,"title":"Go West","original_title":"Go West","overview":"With little luck at keeping a job in the city a New Yorker tries work in the country and eventually finds his way leading a herd of cattle to the West Coast.","poster_path":"/chZ6GbfTIKgD6nYmUKZScDAnIo8.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,37],"popularity":11.234,"release_date":"1925-11-01","video":false,"vote_average":6.901,"vote_count":121},{"backdrop_path":"/2UoQWAxqhrP1iKhoWU4TzGO3FlT.jpg","id":91487,"title":"State of Siege","original_title":"État de siège","overview":"Using the interrogation of a US counterinsurgency agent as a backdrop, the film explores the consequences of the struggle between Uruguay's government and the leftist Tupamaro guerrillas.","poster_path":"/yEH5yjGFgcEmS36XhFzIblQF0fJ.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[53,18],"popularity":11.082,"release_date":"1972-12-30","video":false,"vote_average":7.255,"vote_count":92},{"backdrop_path":"/qrqDQvGu9FYayQUqkZY9Qc6BCGv.jpg","id":96546,"title":"Fear","original_title":"La Paura","overview":"Irene Wagner, the wife of the prominent German scientist Professor Albert Wagner, had been having an affair with Erich Baumann. She does not disclose this to her husband, hoping to preserve his innocence and their \"perfect marriage\". This fills her with anxiety and guilt. However, Johanna Schultze, Erich's jealous ex-girlfriend, learns about the affair and begins to blackmail Irene, turning Irene's psychological torture into a harsh reality.","poster_path":"/srnmuA2cg9ZAUNjnHQp1g1fbrmp.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[53,18],"popularity":10.149,"release_date":"1954-11-05","video":false,"vote_average":6.4,"vote_count":42},{"backdrop_path":"/pYr1aWnNCYLrzQpaDCWMkEBibZH.jpg","id":44340,"title":"Wendigo","original_title":"Wendigo","overview":"A family from the city decide to spend a weekend away at a friend's country farmhouse. One day, his car stalls, another car slams into him, runs head on into a third car and flips into the ditch. The other driver, Julia, is critically injured. He visits her in the hospital and is greeted by her family, who assumes he must be the Sebastian she told them about, the new fiance she met in Vietnam.","poster_path":"/oWY8hQ1vuEL9PLIzqoJtjGN3k2W.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"da","genre_ids":[53,80,18],"popularity":7.667,"release_date":"2007-08-22","video":false,"vote_average":6.9,"vote_count":77},{"backdrop_path":"/14VQVLYrx2kBojsJyrJYNz9QqZI.jpg","id":4269,"title":"A Room in Town","original_title":"Une chambre en ville","overview":"Set against the backdrop of an increasingly violent strike, a worker falls in love with the middle-class daughter of his landlady.","poster_path":"/eDO1onM1IxTouTFSXM747Wd7Psj.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[18,10749],"popularity":7.819,"release_date":"1982-10-27","video":false,"vote_average":6.4,"vote_count":73},{"backdrop_path":"/qEKkA07NBx2FPpciIXZQrTkEvXi.jpg","id":91088,"title":"The King of Pigs","original_title":"돼지의 왕","overview":"After his business goes bankrupt, 30 something Kyeong-Min kills his wife impulsively. Hiding his anger, he seeks out his former middle school classmate Jong-Seok. Jong-Seok now works as a ghostwriter for an autobiography, but he dreams of writing his own novel. For the first time in 15 years they meet. Kyeong-Min and Jong-Seok both hide their own current situations and begin to talk about their middle school days.","poster_path":"/o93tMT3eyeOXBZ8F8TiGQWUq3Ta.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ko","genre_ids":[16,53,18],"popularity":9.554,"release_date":"2011-11-03","video":false,"vote_average":6.114,"vote_count":70},{"backdrop_path":"/1bMEIfLx9WhrNy0teBkVg42jL7U.jpg","id":215908,"title":"Noah","original_title":"Noah","overview":"In a story that plays out entirely on a teenager's computer screen, Noah follows its eponymous protagonist as his relationship takes a rapid turn for the worse in this fascinating study of behavior (and romance) in the digital age.","poster_path":"/qY2vwXELGgzwgsrTJgUOynblTiQ.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":1.376,"release_date":"2013-09-09","video":false,"vote_average":7.25,"vote_count":19}],"total_pages":2,"total_results":40}
